concept.title: 5332.402 General

conbody.p: (c)(1)(iii) See MP5301.601-90. Submit determinations through the SCO to SAF/AQC for approval.

(e)(2) The contracting officer must submit each advance payment request through the SCO to SAF/AQC for submission to SAF/FMF for review and approval. See MP5332.470 for processing advance payment requests.
